channel.title: [PI] Friends list Not 100%, Help please [PI]
channel.description: Hey, so i got this problem where if i add some one thats playing my server they got online right, but when they logg off they are still green in the friends list... i really need to fix that, does anyone have any ideas? please feel free to post some.
